plaintext: You have within you the strength, the patience, and the passion to reach for the stars, to change the world.

plaintext: If football has taught me anything, it is that you can overcome anything if and only if you love something enough.

plaintext: There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle.

plaintext: True friends aren't the ones who make your problems dissappear. They are the ones who won't disappear when you're facing problems

plaintext: The backbone of the electrical grid is largely massive numbers of steam driven engines that turn electrical generators.

plaintext: The measure of greatness in a scientific idea is the extent to which it stimulates thought and opens up new lines of research.

plaintext: Life's trail can double back and retrace its path several times but when it does you learn more. What is the same is also different.

plaintext: Do you think there are smartphones in the afterlife? Because if not, lots of people are going to be very miserable there.

plaintext: Net neutrality is about more than free speech and treating all data and information equally.

plaintext: At my time of life opinions are tolerably fixed. It is not likely that I should now see or hear anything to change them.

plaintext: You don't need fancy highbrow traditions or money to really learn. You just need people with the desire to better themselves.

plaintext: When I despair, I remember that all through history the way of truth and love have always won.

plaintext: You don't write because you want to say something, you write because you have something to say.
